1: Hallelujah! Sing to the LORD a new song, his praise in the assembly of the faithful.
2: Let Israel celebrate its Maker; let the children of Zion rejoice in their King.
3: Let them praise his name with dancing and make music to him with tambourine and lyre.
4: For the LORD takes pleasure in his people; he adorns the humble with salvation.
5: Let the faithful celebrate in triumphal glory; let them shout for joy on their beds.
6: Let the exaltation of God be in their mouths and a double-edged sword in their hands,
7: inflicting vengeance on the nations and punishment on the peoples,
8: binding their kings with chains and their dignitaries with iron shackles,
9: carrying out the judgment decreed against them. This honor is for all his faithful people. Hallelujah!
